name: Witch Dress Up
description:
Witch Dress Up

Oh no! The Sacrifice Ritual is starting in one hour! Please help me get ready~

  • Created for "Spooktober Jam"
  • To move facial features, drag the oval skin part
  • You can play Fullscreen if you hit the 'Fullscreen' Button Twice
  • Unavailable on Mobile Devices
  • Yes I vomited purple all over this game
  • Feel free to share pictures of your characters in the comments!

(Mac) Hold: Shift >Command>3

(PC) Press the 'Windows' Key and search "Snipping Tool" + New Snip

  • Your constructive feedback and supportive comments mean more to me than you know. Thanks for playing ~
